Class MainManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.CMPUT301W15T02.teamtoapp.MainManager

  • public class MainManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Function: Save any changes offline/online. MainManager will send requests to LocalDataManager and/or ElasticSearchDataManager depending on whether offline/online state.
